verses.roman:
saṅkṣepe kahiluṅ ei madhya-līlāra sāra
koṭi-granthe varṇana nā yāya ihāra vistāra

synonyms: saṅkṣepe—in brief; kahiluṅ—I have described; ei—this; madhya-līlāra sāra—essence of Madhya-līlā; koṭi-granthe—in millions of books; varṇana—description; nā yāya—is not possible; ihāra vistāra—elaborately.
translation: I have now summarized the entire subject matter of the Madhya-līlā. These pastimes cannot be described elaborately even in millions of books.
